constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 125 (Friday, July 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Miss RICE of New York:
H.R. 4484.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H3634]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight, Management, and Accountability.

title: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to provide for certain succession reforms, and for other purposes.
